mapper.insert: insert into tgrp_list(sn, grp_sn, user_id, grp_role, status) values(seq_tgrp_list.nextval, #{grpSn}, #{userId}, #{grpRole}, #{status})
mapper.select: select l.sn, l.grp_sn, l.user_id, u.name, l.grp_role, l.status from tgrp_list l, tuser u where l.user_id = u.id and l.grp_sn = #{grpSn}
